ygData.subject: FW:  /shout Hello Everyone!
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello everyone I m new to this club and my name is Ron and I m a EQ addict lol.  I just thought I d introduce myself to everyone and give a little background
ygData.messageBody:
Hello everyone I'm new to this club and my name is Ron and I'm a EQ addict lol.  I just thought I'd introduce myself to everyone and give a little background info about myself.  Well I've been playing EQ for about 2 years now and I love it.  I play on Ayonae Ro and my main is a 29 troll warrior and I also have a 25 iksar necro, 12 human monk, and the rest of my characters are just throw away ones, I wanted to experiment to see how the different classes play like.  Well I'm also in the navy out here in the gulf and I'm stationed in Everett, WA.  I haven't played EQ since March 2nd (we left for westpac March 3rd) and I won't be able to play until we get back sometime in middle November.  I have with me here on the ship just about every EQ book/guide that came out lol from Kunark to Luclin to the EQ Atlas and the EQ spellbook..I read them whenever I have EQ withdrawls (which is everyday).  So yeah I just can't wait to come back to the states and play again.  Well I guess I'd better get going for now, take care everyone and happy hunting!
 
/camp
